mapper.select: SELECT `pm_communities`.`community_id`, `pm_communities`.`name`, `pm_communities`.`telephone`, `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id`, `pm_subdistricts`.`name` AS 'subdistrict_name' FROM `pm_communities` LEFT JOIN `pm_subdistricts` ON `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id` = `pm_subdistricts`.`subdistrict_id` ORDER BY CONVERT(`pm_communities`.`name` USING gbk) ASC

SELECT `pm_communities`.`community_id`, `pm_communities`.`name`, `pm_communities`.`telephone`, `pm_communities`.`actual_number`, `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id`, `pm_subdistricts`.`name` AS 'subdistrict_name', `pm_subdistricts`.`telephone` AS 'subdistrict_telephone' FROM `pm_communities` LEFT JOIN `pm_subdistricts` ON `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id` = `pm_subdistricts`.`subdistrict_id` WHERE `pm_communities`.`community_id` = #{communityId}

SELECT `pm_communities`.`community_id`, `pm_communities`.`name`, `pm_subdistricts`.subdistrict_id, `pm_subdistricts`.`name` AS 'subdistrict_name' FROM `pm_communities` LEFT JOIN `pm_subdistricts` ON `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id` = `pm_subdistricts`.`subdistrict_id` WHERE `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id` = #{subdistrictId}

SELECT `pm_communities`.`community_id`, `pm_communities`.`name`, `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id`, `pm_subdistricts`.`name` AS 'subdistrict_name' FROM `pm_communities` LEFT JOIN `pm_subdistricts` ON `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id` = `pm_subdistricts`.`subdistrict_id` WHERE `pm_subdistricts`.`name` = #{subdistrictName}

SELECT `pm_communities`.`name`, COUNT(`pm_community_residents`.`community_resident_id`) AS 'actual_number' FROM `pm_communities` LEFT JOIN `pm_community_residents` ON `pm_community_residents`.`community_id` = `pm_communities`.`community_id` WHERE `pm_communities`.`subdistrict_id` = #{subdistrictId} GROUP BY `pm_communities`.`name`;
